member.name: IShellImageData.CloneFrame
member.summary: Retrieves a clone of the current image or frame.
member.param: The address that receives a pointer to the clone image. If this parameter is NULL on entry, an unhandled exception results.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The ppImg parameter is NULL on entry or the image cannot be cloned. In the latter case, ppImg is set to NULL.

member.name: IShellImageData.Decode
member.summary: Decodes the image file, setting state.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Load the entire image file into memory.

member.param: The desired horizontal size of the decoded image. This parameter is only used if the SHIMGDEC_THUMBNAIL flag is set. If the SHIMGDEC_DEFAULT flag is set instead, this value is ignored.
The desired vertical size of the decoded image. This parameter is only used if the SHIMGDEC_THUMBNAIL flag is set. If the SHIMGDEC_DEFAULT flag is set instead, this value is ignored.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The file could not be loaded or the calling application stopped the decode process through a call to a registered (see for more information).
The internal object cannot be instantiated.
The path used to create this instance of was a URL.
The image has already been decoded.

member.name: IShellImageData.DiscardEdit
member.summary: Discards edits made to an image.

member.name: IShellImageData.DisplayName
member.summary: Gets the name of the file if was initialized on a file path. Otherwise, gets the name of the data stream.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the display name as a Unicode string. On exit, the contents of the buffer are only valid when the method returns S_OK.
The size, in characters, of the buffer pointed to by wszName.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The file name or stream name cannot be retrieved.

member.name: IShellImageData.Draw
member.summary: Draws a decoded image.
member.param: The handle of the image.
A pointer to a , measured in pixels, that specifies the bounds of the rendered image. The portion of the image specified by prcSrc is scaled to fill the rectangle specified by prcDest.
A pointer to a that specifies the portion of the image to be drawn.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image was not previously decoded, the call to failed, or hdc is NULL. Other internal calls also can cause this error to be returned.
The process was terminated by the calling application through a registered instance of .

member.name: IShellImageData.GetCurrentPage
member.summary: Gets the current page of a multipage image.
member.param: A pointer to the page number.
member.returns: Returns S_OK. If the image is not a multipage image, such as a .jpg file, the method returns S_OK with a page number of 0.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetDelay
member.summary: Gets the delay value for the current frame of an animation.
member.param: A pointer to the delay value, in milliseconds. This value is valid only when the method returns S_OK.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetEncoderParams
member.summary: Gets the current set of encoder parameters.
member.param: A pointer to a GUID that specifies the encoder. This must be an encoder supported by GDI+. If this parameter is NULL, an unhandled exception results.
The address of a pointer to an array of EncoderParameter objects.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description:
Several circumstances can generate this return value.
The image was not decoded or the decoding process failed.
pguidFmt refers to a format not supported by GDI+.
An internal call failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetPageCount
member.summary: Gets the number of pages in a multipage image.
member.param: A pointer to the page count. This value is valid only when the method returns S_OK.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetPixelFormat
member.summary: Gets the pixel format of the image.
member.param: A pointer to a value of type PixelFormat indicating the pixel format. This value is valid only when the method returns S_OK.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetProperties
member.summary: Gets an through which the properties of the image can be accessed.
member.param: Not used, set to 0.
The address of a pointer to the interface.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded or the decoding process failed.
The ppPropSet pointer is not valid.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetRawDataFormat
member.summary: Retrieves a GUID that identifies the format of the image.
member.param: A pointer to a value indicating the format. This value is valid only when the method returns S_OK.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetResolution
member.summary: Gets the resolution, in dots per inch (dpi), of the image.
member.param: A pointer to the horizontal resolution.
A pointer to the vertical resolution.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded, the decode process failed, or the resolution cannot be retrieved. In the latter case, both puResolutionX and puResolutionY are set to 0.
Both puResolutionX and puResolutionY are NULL.

member.name: IShellImageData.GetSize
member.summary: Gets the dimensions of the image file.
member.param: A pointer to a structure containing the size of the image. This value is valid only when the method returns S_OK.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.IsAnimated
member.summary: Determines whether the image is animated.

returns.para: Returns one of the following:

listheader.description: The image is not animated, has not been decoded, or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.IsDecoded
member.summary: Determines whether the image has been decoded by calling . Many operations return a failure code if the image is not first decoded.

returns.para: Returns one of the following:

listheader.description: was called on the image and was successful.

member.name: IShellImageData.IsEditable
member.summary: Determines whether the image can be edited.

returns.para: Returns one of the following:

listheader.description: The image cannot be edited, the image has not been decoded, or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.IsMultipage
member.summary: Determines whether the image is a multipage Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) image.

returns.para: Returns one of the following:

listheader.description: The image contains more than one page.
The image has only one page, the image has not been decoded, or the decoding process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.IsPrintable
member.summary: Determines whether the image can be printed.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded.

member.name: IShellImageData.IsTransparent
member.summary: Determines whether the image is transparent.

returns.para: Returns one of the following:

listheader.description: The image does not have transparency.
The image has not been decoded.

member.name: IShellImageData.IsVector
member.summary: Determines whether the image is a vector image.

returns.para: Returns one of the following:

listheader.description: The image is a vector image, supporting the GDI+ flag .
The image has not been decoded, the image is empty, or the file is not an image.

member.name: IShellImageData.NextFrame
member.summary: Switches to the next frame of an animated image.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The current frame cannot be retrieved.
The image is not animated, the image has not yet been decoded, or a limit on the number of times to loop the animation has been reached.
The next frame is not yet available.

member.name: IShellImageData.NextPage
member.summary: Switches to the next page of a multipage image. Any associated animations are reset.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The current page cannot be retrieved.
No further pages are available, the image was not previously decoded, or the decode process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.PrevPage
member.summary: Switches to the previous page of a multipage image. Any associated animations are reset.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The current frame cannot be retrieved.
No previous pages are available, the image was not previously decoded, or the decode process failed.

member.name: IShellImageData.RegisterAbort
member.summary: Sets a callback abort object, optionally returning a pointer to the previous object.
member.param: A pointer to an abort object. If this parameter is NULL, an unhandled exception results.
The address of a pointer to the previous abort object. This parameter can be NULL if the previous object is not of interest.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IShellImageData.ReplaceFrame
member.summary: Replaces the current frame with a new image.
member.param: The address of the new image.

member.name: IShellImageData.Rotate
member.summary: Rotates an image in increments of 90 degrees.
member.param: The angle of rotation. Only angles of 0, 90, 180, and 270 are recognized.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image has not been decoded or the decoding process failed. This value is also returned when certain internal calls to GDI+ methods fail.
The image is an animated image and cannot be rotated.
The dwAngle parameter is a value other than 0, 90, 180, or 270.
Not enough resources are available for the method to create an internal working copy of the image.

member.name: IShellImageData.Scale
member.summary: Adjusts the size of an image.
member.param: The horizontal (x) dimension. If this value is 0, the x dimension is set to a scaled value based on the point specified in cy.
The vertical (y) dimension. If this value is 0, the y dimension is set to a scaled value based on the point specified in cx.
A member of the enumeration, specifying the algorithm that is used when the image is scaled.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The image was not previously decoded or the call to failed. Other internal calls also can cause this error to be returned.
The image is an animated image and cannot be scaled using this method.
The internal object cannot be instantiated.
The process was stopped by the calling application through a registered instance of .

member.name: IShellImageData.SelectPage
member.summary: Selects a specified page in a multipage image.
member.param: The page number of the page to select.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The current page cannot be retrieved, the image has not been decoded, or the decoding process failed.
The specified page number does not exist.

member.name: IShellImageData.SetEncoderParams
member.summary: Sets encoder parameters.
member.param: A pointer to an containing the encoder properties.
